messages.content: LoRTnoC(LoRA with hint block of ControlNet) is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows users to use the LoRTnoC model.
Where should the model file for LoRTnoC-ComfyUI be placed?
The model file for LoRTnoC-ComfyUI should be placed in the same location as the ControlNet model file.
Is there an example of how LoRTnoC-ComfyUI can be used with ComfyUI?
Yes, there is an example with a workflow attached to an image, which demonstrates how LoRTnoC-ComfyUI can be used to generate images based on input references.
What methods are used in the example image generation with LoRTnoC-ComfyUI?
The example image generation with LoRTnoC-ComfyUI uses methods like Canny, Depth, Hed, Fake Scribble, Lineart Anime, and Pose.
Can I see the generated images for the example using LoRTnoC-ComfyUI?
Yes, you can see the generated images in the documentation, which has image references like Canny, Depth, Hed, Fake Scribble, Lineart Anime, and Pose, along with their respective generated images.
